info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: eps.sante.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Accept-Ranges: bytes Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate Content-Language: en- Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; frame-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://storage.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data: Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 17 Jul 2022 03:05:48 GMT Expires: 0 Feature-Policy: geolocation 'none'; midi 'none'; sync-xhr 'none'; microphone 'none'; camera 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; speaker 'none'; fullscreen 'self'; payment 'none' Last-Modified: Fri, 10 Jun 2022 08:46:19 GMT Pragma: no-cache Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgos-eps.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!pnaXwJTK6Exj569nRzbxqujnleDLVj0b4SrZT/XITmnsy0mGGHoTkyTw9ntjOvCM/X94Dbl5jc1uHMc+HsJrJjE7MxI=; path=/; Httponly; Secure Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Éthique des professionnels de santé

Une erreur est survenue lors du chargement de l'application.

request:
OPTIONS / HTTP/1.1
Host: eps.sante.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Allow: GET,HEAD,OPTIONS
Date: Sun, 17 Jul 2022 03:05:49 GMT
Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgos-eps.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!M5qmMgoUETBTM71nRzbxqujnleDLVmyslHlgVOhQ6bgmDs18MVJ3l53iwS3A0kBSIz1nma6nNmmVKhmETPXuY9dFGNk=; path=/; Httponly; Secure
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
Content-Length: 0

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: eps.sante.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Allow: GET, HEAD
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; frame-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://storage.googleapis.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data:
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Date: Sun, 17 Jul 2022 03:06:05 GMT
Expires: 0
Feature-Policy: geolocation 'none'; midi 'none'; sync-xhr 'none'; microphone 'none'; camera 'none'; magnetometer 'none'; gyroscope 'none'; speaker 'none'; fullscreen 'self'; payment 'none'
Pragma: no-cache
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-dgos-eps.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=!VvoSdlZH0v+I971nRzbxqujnleDLVuCVPGt74PkK5O5DK2XgC0Fyem4B2KNPtST9TnUvQ9d/L2MToVC7yiIubYLwwuU=; path=/; Httponly; Secure
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

{"timestamp":"2022-07-17T03:06:05.589+0000","status":405,"error":"Method Not Allowed","message":"Request method 'POST' not supported","path":"/"}
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: eps.sante.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://eps.sante.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect Springboot Information page
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Displays app name and version information among others values

User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
